For noobs: Follow these instructions to the T and the game should work. 

1. Download torrent.
2. Mount the downloaded image file with DaemonTools or similar program OR burn the iso file to DVD and run it. 
3. Install the game normally, just follow the installation wizard. 
4. Open the ISO file you downloaded (rld-fc3bd) with WinRar and navigate to the "Crack" folder.
5. Move EVERYTHING from the crack folder to Blood Dragon's BIN folder, the file path will be something like "C:Program Files (x86)UbisoftFar Cry 3 Blood Dragonbin" To move the stuff, either select it all and drag it into the BIN folder or extract to proper folder using WinRar.
6. When asked if you want to replace overlapping files, say YES. You want to replace the files existing in BIN with the similarly named files in the crack folder of your download. 
7. Play game. 
Tip: Not sure if it helps like in FC3, but I created a new desktop shortcut and added "-offline" to the end of the file path in properties to prevent the game from accessing the Internet without having to turn my actual Internet connection off.
Tip: If you're experiencing slow and out-of-sync cinimatics, open the graphics option menu and change the PostFX option to low or medium. Also consider turning off AA. 

Unlimited Ammo cheat: While I couldn't get the FC3 god mode cheat to work in BD, the unlimited ammo cheat works. To do the cheat, create a desktop shortcut, right-click, select Properties, add "-GameProfile_UnlimitedAmmo 1" to the end of the Target field. Make sure you leave a space between the actual target and the cheat code.
